label: sock
peekOfCode:
sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_DGRAM)
sock.settimeout(2)  # 2 second timeout so script won't hang forever
# Send the command
sock.sendto(message.encode('utf-8'), (bulb_ip, 38899))
try:
    # Receive the response
    data, addr = sock.recvfrom(1024)  # buffer size 1024 bytes
    print("Response from bulb:", data.decode('utf-8'))
except socket.timeout:
    print("No response from bulb (timeout)")

def discover_wiz_bulbs(timeout=3):
    bulbs = []
    # Create UDP socket
    sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_DGRAM)
    sock.setsockopt(socket.SOL_SOCKET, socket.SO_BROADCAST, 1)
    sock.settimeout(timeout)
    try:
        # Send broadcast
        sock.sendto(DISCOVERY_MESSAGE.encode('utf-8'), (BROADCAST_IP, PORT))
        print("[*] Searching for WiZ bulbs on the network...")
